title: A sermon of repentaunce a very godly and profitable sermon preached at Lee in Essex / by Arthur Dent ...
author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.
publisher: For John Harison, and are to be solde at the white Greihound in Paules Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
